definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: faint (Ar. kamiha is be pale of face, gray (of daylight), weak-eyed, 0’akmahu blind from birth; Syr. kmah be blind), only fig.—

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Pf. 3 ms. [[לְ ְבְשָׂרִי]] ´[[כ]] Ps 63:2 faint (with longing) for thee (‖[[חָֽמְאָה לְ ְנַפְשִׁי]]).
